      • purchaseRoboticonsFromMarket

        public void purchaseRoboticonsFromMarket(int amount,
                                         Market market)
        Purchase roboticon from the market.
        Parameters:
        amount - number of roboticons requested
        market - the market being purchased from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if amount less than or equal to 0
        NotEnoughResourceException - if market does not have enough roboticons
        NotEnoughMoneyException - if the player does not have enough money for the transaction

      • purchaseCustomisationFromMarket

        public void purchaseCustomisationFromMarket(ResourceType resource,
                                            Roboticon roboticon,
                                            Market market)
        Purchase roboticon customisation from the market.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource type of the customisation
        roboticon - The roboticon to be customised.
        market - The market
        Throws:
        InvalidResourceTypeException - if the chosen customisation is invalid
        NotEnoughMoneyException - if the player does not have enough moeny for the transaction

      • purchaseResourceFromMarket

        public void purchaseResourceFromMarket(int amount,
                                       Market market,
                                       ResourceType resource)
        Action for player to purchase resources from the market.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of resources to purchase.
        market - The market instance.
        resource - The resource type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if amount is less than 1
        NotEnoughResourceException - if the market does not have enough of the resource
        NotEnoughMoneyException - if the player does not have enough money for the transaction
